title: Social Studies Instructional Method Development Workshop through Learning Design Standard Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary social studies knowledge and general understanding of curricula
context.additional_context: Collaborative activities using personal devices and implementation of real-time feedback systems

learning_goals: Explain the core concepts and scope of application of the learning design standard (IMS LD)
Practice converting at least three different instructional methods into standards-based designs
Implement lesson designs using BYOD-based formative assessment tools in large-scale offline environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
